song.title: Future world
song.info:
DISABLED DUE TO COMMERCIAL MATERIAL. Will have to contact the group: Every Little Thing and ask if we are allowed to play it on the radio. As I don't understand squat japanese text or can't find a proper e-mail to contact at: http://www.avexnet.or.jp/elt/index.html I'll leave it for someone else who's ambitious.
Update: I contacted AVEX NETWORK thru youtube and asked about this specific song, we'll see their response.
/Elrinth
